verses.verse: "Now <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H1697>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to them to <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> them to <S%H3547>minister<s%> as <S%H3547>priests<s%> to Me: <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish,<s%>

and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>spread<s%> with <S%H8081>oil;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> them of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H5560>flour.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> them in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5536>basket,<s%> and <S%H7126>present<s%> them in the <S%H5536>basket<s%> along with the <S%H6499>bull<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> them with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3801>tunic<s%> and the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> and the <S%H646>ephod<s%> and the <S%H2833>breastpiece,<s%> and <S%H640>gird<s%> him with the <S%H2805>skillfully<s%> <S%H2805>woven<s%> <S%H2805>band<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod;<s%>
and you shall <S%H7660>set<s%> the <S%H4701>turban<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown<s%> on the <S%H4701>turban.<s%>
"Then you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it on his <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him.
"And you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> <S%H3801>tunics<s%> on them.

"And you shall <S%H2296>gird<s%> them with <S%H73>sashes,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H2280>bind<s%> <S%H4021>caps<s%> on them, and they shall <S%H1961>have<s%> the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute.<s%> So you shall <S%H4390>ordain<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> [it] on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> with your <S%H676>finger;<s%> and you shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>entrails<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on them, and <S%H6999>offer<s%> them up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

"But the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> and its <S%H5785>hide<s%> and its <S%H6569>refuse,<s%> you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> it is a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering.<s%>

"You shall also <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram;<s%>
and you shall <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> it <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H5408>cut<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> into its <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> its <S%H7130>entrails<s%> and its <S%H3767>legs,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> [them] with its <S%H5409>pieces<s%> and its <S%H7218>head.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> it is a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> it is a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of its <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> [it] on the <S%H8571>lobe<s%> of Aaron's right <S%H241>ear<s%> and on the <S%H8571>lobes<s%> of his sons' <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ears<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumbs<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> and on the <S%H931>big<s%> <S%H931>toes<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the [rest of the] <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> [it] on <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and on his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and on his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and on his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H899>garments<s%> with him; so he and his <S%H899>garments<s%> shall be <S%H6942>consecrated,<s%> as well as his sons and his sons' <S%H899>garments<s%> with him.

"You shall also <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> from the <S%H352>ram<s%> and the <S%H451>fat<s%> <S%H451>tail,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>entrails<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on them and the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh<s%> (for it is a <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>ordination<s%>),

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3603>cake<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> [mixed with] <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7550>wafer<s%> from the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is [set] <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%>

and you shall <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>these<s%> in the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and in the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them as a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> them from their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H6999>offer<s%> them up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> for a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> it is an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H2373>breast<s%> of Aaron's <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>ordination,<s%> and <S%H5130>wave<s%> it as a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and it shall be your <S%H4490>portion.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> the <S%H2373>breast<s%> of the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> and the <S%H7785>thigh<s%> of the <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5130>waved<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H7311>offered<s%> from the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>ordination,<s%> from the one <S%H834>which<s%> was for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and from the one <S%H834>which<s%> was for his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

"And it shall be for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> as [their] <S%H2706>portion<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> for it is a <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering;<s%> and it shall be a <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of their <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> [even] their <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be for his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, that in them they may be <S%H4886>anointed<s%> and <S%H4390>ordained.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

"For <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> the one of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> who is <S%H3548>priest<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead<s%> shall <S%H3847>put<s%> them on <S%H834>when<s%> he <S%H935>enters<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place.
"And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>ordination<s%> and <S%H1310>boil<s%> its <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

"And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and the <S%H3899>bread<s%> that is in the <S%H5536>basket,<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

"Thus they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> those things by <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> was <S%H3722>made<s%> at their <S%H4390>ordination<s%> <S%H3027><s%> [and] <S%H6942>consecration;<s%> but a <S%H2114>layman<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> [them,] <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

"And <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H4394>ordination<s%> or <S%H4480>any<s%> of the <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3498>remains<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning,<s%> then you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> with <S%H784>fire;<s%> it shall not be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it is <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

"And <S%H3602>thus<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you; you shall <S%H4390>ordain<s%> <S%H3027><s%> them through <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

"And each <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> a <S%H6499>bull<s%> as a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> for <S%H3725>atonement,<s%> and you shall <S%H2398>purify<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> when you <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for it; and you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> it to <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> it.

"For <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> it; then the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> [and] <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H6942>holy.<s%>

"Now <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H834>what<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> each <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H8548>continuously.<s%>
"The <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>twilight;<s%>

and there [shall be] <S%H259>one-tenth<s%> [of an ephah] of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with one-fourth of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3795>beaten<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and one-fourth of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> for a <S%H5262>libation<s%> with one <S%H3532>lamb.<s%>

"And the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>twilight,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> with it the same grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> as the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and the same <S%H5262>libation,<s%> for a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"It shall be a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with you, to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you <S%H8033>there.<s%>
"And I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and it shall be <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> by My <S%H9202>glory.<s%>

"And I will <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> I will also <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to <S%H3547>minister<s%> as <S%H3547>priests<s%> to Me.
"And I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and will be their <S%H430>God.<s%>

"And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that I might <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them; I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>
